tasks.task_description: Examine current directory structure and identify Terraform/deployment files
Move Terraform and deployment files to new location
Update any path references in the moved files

description: Move Terraform code and deployment scripts from 1.code/deep_vibe_node_server to 2.iac/deep_vibe_node_server and ensure proper functionality
context: Identified Terraform files in terraform/ directory and deployment scripts (deploy.sh, destroy.sh, start.sh, stop.sh). The 2.iac directory exists with just a .gitkeep file.
Moved Terraform directory and deployment scripts to 2.iac/deep_vibe_node_server
Updated deploy.sh script to reference correct paths for Docker build and Terraform output. Created README.md with usage instructions.
Made scripts executable, validated Terraform configuration successfully, and removed original files from source directory. The move is complete and functional.
